synopsis.text:
Episode zero of "Yuru Camp" sets the stage for the Outdoor Activities Club, founded by enthusiastic duo Chiaki Oogaki and Aoi Inuyama. Before Nadeshiko Kagamihara becomes a member, the club is a humble operation with big plans. As the club grows, so does the interest of their peers, drawing in curious visitors to their quaint clubhouse.

In a series of special episodes, the girls embark on an exciting camping trip to Australia, accompanied by friends Rin Shima and Ena Saitou. What begins as a leisurely outing takes an unexpected turn, transforming the trip into a thrilling adventure.

These special episodes, initially released with the Blu-ray/DVD volumes, offer fans a deeper dive into the world of "Yuru Camp," revealing the club's origins and showcasing the girls' unforgettable Australian escapade.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
